school.name: Shree Shanti Bhagawati Secondary School
school.about: Shree Shanti Bhagawati Secondary School is a community school located in Letang, Morang, Nepal. It was established in 2009 B.S. and has been providing quality education to the local community ever since. The school is committed to fostering a conducive learning environment and promoting holistic development among its students.

services.title: School Environment
services.description:
1. Spacious playground and clean environment.
  2. Well-organized classrooms.
  3. School-based health services.
  4. 24/7 CCTV surveillance system.

services.title: Education System
services.description:
1. Six faculties including technical education.
  2. Library with a wide collection of books.
  3. Well-equipped laboratories for practical learning.
  4. Scholarship distribution programs.

services.title: Other Important Activities
services.description:
1. Daily question-answer sessions and oratory practice.
  2. Weekly sports activities.
  3. Monthly subject-wise class tests.
  4. Meetings among teachers, students, and parents.

faculties.title: Engineering (Grade 9–12)
faculties.description: Technical education based on Computer and Electrical Engineering with practical learning opportunities.

faculties.title: Science (Grade 11–12)
faculties.description: Advanced studies in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Computer with well-equipped laboratories.

faculties.title: Management (Grade 11–12)
faculties.description: Modern curriculum focused on Accounting, Management, Entrepreneurship, and Information Technology.

faculties.title: Education (Grade 11–12)
faculties.description: Teacher-training program based on Education Science, Psychology, and Sociology.

faculties.title: English Medium (Up to Grade 10)
faculties.description: Quality education through ICT-based teaching methods, CBT techniques, and creative learning approaches.

faculties.title: Nepali Medium (Up to Grade 10)
faculties.description: Effective learning in the Nepali language with a focus on discipline, values, and cultural education.
